title: NATIONAL SEMINAR  ON SANSKRIT DRAMA
subtitle: NATIONAL SEMINAR ON SANSKRIT DRAMA on 14th & 15th  FEBRUARY, 2025
description:
The Samskrita Academy Madras & The  Kuppuswami  Sastri Research  Institute jointly organized a two-day NATIONAL SEMINAR ON SANSKRIT DRAMA. The event was very well received attracting participants from various city colleges and scholars across the country who presented papers on various themes of Sanskrit Drama.


Friday, 14th February 2025 INAUGURATION — 10.00 a.m. – 10.30 a.m.

KALAIMAMANI VIDUSHI VASANTHALAKSHMI NARASIMHACHARI

(Bharatanatyam exponent) inaugurated the function

Dr. R.K. RAGHAVAN

(President, The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute, Chennai)

presided over the function.


SESSION I — VARIETIES OF SANSKRIT DRAMAS

10.30 a.m. – 1.00 p.m.


SMT. BALAMBAL MEMORIAL ENDOWMENT & SRI D. RAMAKRISHNA IYER MEMORIAL ENDOWMENT

Chairperson : Dr. DEBAJYOTI JENA

(HOD, Dept. of Sanskrit and Indian Culture, SCSVMV

(Deemed to be University) Enathur, Kanchipuram


1.      Dr.K.Vidyuta

Asst.Prof., The KSRI

Tripuradāhaḍima-An Introduction

2.      Dr.P.C.Muralidharn

Asst.Prof, The KSRI

PārijātaNāṭaka-An Introduction

3.      K.Bhuvaneshwari

Research Scholar, The KSRI

Catharsis in Vyāyoga type of drama

4. S.Amruthavalli

Ph.D Research Scholar, Srimad Andavan arts and Science College, Trichy

भवभूतिरूपकेषु सदुपदेशाः

 


SESSION II — EPICS, PURĀNAS & HISTORICAL EVENTS (2.00 p.m. – 4.30 p.m.)

SRI T.M. KRISHNASWAMY IYER ENDOWMENT & SRI N.V. RAGHAVAN ENDOWMENT

Chairperson : Dr. V. KAMESWARI

(Former Director, The KSRI)


1. Dr.V.Anusha

Asst.Prof. Dept. of Sanskrit, Ethiraj College for Women

  Epic incidents in Dūtavākya

2. Dr.V.Preethi

Asst.Prof, The KSRI

Svarṇamuktasamvāda

3. Lavanya V.Easwar

Asst.Prof, The KSRI

Unmatta Rāghava

4. R.Ramya Bhatt

Asst.Prof. Guru Nanak College

A glance of historical events in Drama-KaumudiMahotsava

5. Dr.S.Madhurambika

  Asst.Prof (S.S), Ethiraj College for Women

  A note on minor character – charioteer in the plays of Bhāsa

  6. R.Gayathri

Research Scholar, The KSRI

An overview of Ghaṇaśyāma’s Navagrahacaritam

7. G.Sridharini

I year M.A. Sanskrit, Srimad Andavan arts and Science College, Trichy

Sanskrit Dramas based on Epics, Purāṇas and Historical Events

 


SESSION III — DRAMATURGICAL TEXTS AND TECHNICAL ASPECTS (10.30 a.m.–1.00 p.m.)

Mm. Prof. S. KUPPUSWAMI SASTRI ENDOWMENT & P. K. SUBRAMANIA IYER ENDOWMENT

Chairperson : Dr. S.UMAPATHI

(Asso. Prof. & Head, Dept. of Sanskrit/Sahitya,The Madras Sanskrit College)



1.      Dr.V.Sowmyanarayanan

Asst. Prof. & Head, Dept. of Sanskrit, D.G.Vaishnav College, Chennai

नाट्यालय निर्माण-संस्कार- प्रयोगविधयः

2.      M.Ekalakshmi

Asst.Prof., Shri Shankarlal Shasun Jain College, Chennai

Patākāsthāna and its treatment in classical Sanskrit Dramas

3. G.Meenakshi

Asst.Prof. Srimad Andavan arts and Science College, Trichy

Ṛgvedenāṭakatattvam

4.     Dr.N.Bhuvaneswari

Research Scholar, The KSRI

Vṛttis in Prasanna Rāghava

5. Reshma S Raj

Research Scholar, Kerala University, University College

Concept and Application of pañcasandhi in Nāṭyaśāstra with special reference to Āścaryacūḍāmaṇi

6. S.Sugantha

Research Scholar, The Madras Sanskrit College, Mylapore

Sandhi in Rāmabhadradīkṣita’s JānakīPariṇayanāṭaka- An Analytical Study

SESSION IV — MODERN SANSKRIT DRAMAS & ALLEGORICAL PLAYS (2.00 p.m.– 4.00 p.m.)

Smt. SUNDARAMBAL ENDOWMENT & Dr. S. JAYASREE MEMORIAL ENDOWMENT

Chairperson : Dr. T.V. VASUDEVA

(Deputy Director, The KSRI)


1.      Dr.V.Ramakrishnan

Asst.Prof. of Advaita Vedanta, The Madras Sanskrit College

नल्लाध्वरिकृतजीवन्मुक्तिकल्याणनाटकम्

2.      R.Sowmiya

Asst. Prof., MOP Vaishnav College for Women, Chennai

DinakaraRājakumārahemalekham (Hamlet)

3. R.Rajalakshmi

Research Scholar, The Madras Sanskrit College

श्रीमुत्तुस्वामिदीक्षितवैभवम् नाम नवीन- उपरूपकम् – Śrīmuttusvāmidīkṣitavaibhavam-A Modern Sanskrit Drama

4. V.R.Srinivasan

Research scholar, The KSRI

Bhārata saundaryam

5. Siji M.Rajan

Research Scholar, Government Sanskrit College, Tripunithura

Modern Sanskrit Dramas of Sri Asokan - purāṇattukara – A Socio Cultural Study

6. Dr.S.Brahadha Prasanna

Asst.Prof., Srimad Andavan arts and Science College, Trichy

Literary Merits of Śiñjinīyam

7. Priyamvada Kannan

Research Scholar, Presidency College, Chennai

Modern Sanskrit Dramas- Nighnatāpasa

8. K.C.Santhosh

Student, RKM Vivekananda College, Chennai

An Overview of Śaktiśāradam of Dr.J.B.Chaudhuri

9.G.Suresh

Asst. Prof. Dept. of Sahitya

The Madras Sanskrit College.


Saturday, 15th February 2025

VALEDICTORY FUNCTION — 4.00 p.m

Dr. N.V. DEVI PRASAD

(Former Principal, The Madras Sanskrit College)

delivered the Valedictory Address.

title: Inter-school Antyakshari Sloka Recitation Competition in Sanskrit
subtitle: Guna Pai Priyamvada Bai Akshara Slokam Endowment.
description:
The Institute conducted Inter-school Antyakshari Sloka Recitation Competition in Sanskrit under the Guna Pai Priyamvada Bai Akshara Slokam Endowment. Three students from classes IX - XII from various city schools participated in the competition and made it a great success.

 

           Date & Day    :          Friday, 10.01.2025

           Time               :          10.30.a.m.

           Venue             :          Institute premises, Sanskrit College campus

                                               Mylapore, Chennai 600 004.

The following students won prizes

 

           Prizes in cash 

I          prize               Rs.4000/- Chava Kavyagna Chowdary,

                                       Class IX, PSBB Sr. Sec. School, Nungambakkam.

II        Prize               Rs.3000/- B. Madhumitha,

                                                    Class IX, PSBB Sr. Sec. School, KK. Nagar

 

III       Prize               Rs.2000/- S. Nivedita

                                                   Sri Sankara Sr. Sec. School, Adyar.

 

Consolation I             Rs.1000/- B. Rithika

                                                   IX, PSBB Sr. Sec. School, Nungambakkam

 

Consolation II            Rs. 750/- Aarna Aravind

              X, PSBB Sr. Sec. School, Nungambakkam

title: National Seminar on Vedāṅgas and Upavedas
subtitle: National Seminar on Vedāṅgas and Upavedas
description: THE SAMSKRITA ACADEMY MADRAS & THE KUPPUSWAMI SASTRI RESEARCH INSTITUTE jointly organized a two-day NATIONAL SEMINAR ON UPAVEDAS & VEDANGAS on 22nd & 23rd NOVEMBER, 2024.

title: NARASIMHACHARI ENDOWMENT - SANSKRIT RECITATION COMPETITION
subtitle: SUBRAMHANYA BHUJANGAM / SAUNDARYA LAHARI SANSKRIT RECITATION COMPETITION
description: Under the Narasimhachari endownment, The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute conducted a Sanskrit Sloka recitation Competition on 25th October 2024. Around 40 students from various city schools actively participated in the competition and recited 20 shlokas from either SUBRAMHANYA BHUJANGAM or SAUNDARYA LAHARI.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: 75th ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATIONS -  VALEDICTORY FUNCTION
subtitle: 75th ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATIONS -  VALEDICTORY FUNCTION
description:
The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute is celebrating its 75th anniversary. To commemorate this milestone the Institute organized various National Workshops, Seminars and Lectures on various subjects like Bhakti, Art& Architecture, Sanskrit Literature, Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy. 
The Valedictory Function of the 75th Anniversary Celebrations will be celebrated on 13th Sepetember, 2024 at 5.00pm at The Madras Sanskrit College Premises.

Dr. N. Gopalaswami IAS(Retd.) will preside over the function and release the book "ŚEṢASAMHITĀ" and honor the prominent donors.

Dr. S. Ramaratnam , Chancellor, Jagadguru Kripalu University, Odisha will deliver the Valedictory address.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: "VEDANTA DESIKA DAY" - Dr. Lakshmi Kumari and Varun Krishna Endowment
subtitle: PĀDUKĀ SAHASRAM OF SRI VEDANTA DESIKA
description: Dr. P.C. Muralidharan (Asst. Prof., The KSRI)
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: SYNOPSIS PRESENTATION
subtitle: Sredhi Vyavahara -Progressions in Ancient Indian Mathematics
description: Ph.D. candidate Ms. B. Vijayalakshmi, under the supervision of Dr. V. Yamuna Devi, Deputy Director, The KSRI,   submitted her synopsis on "Sredhi Vyavahara -Progressions in Ancient Indian Mathematics" at the Institute premises on 20th August 2024.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: SANSKRIT DAY CELEBRATIONS at RAJ BHAVAN
subtitle: Dr. V. Kameswari (former Director of the Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute) honored by the Governor of Tamil Nadu
description: Dr. V.Kameswari (Former Director of the Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute) was honored with an award by the governor for her distinguished service to the field of Sanskrit and Indological research. The Samskruta Bharati, Tamil Nadu organized a Samskruta Day celebration on August 19 2024 at the Bharatiyar Mandapam at Raj Bhavan, Guindy. Thiru. R.N. Ravi, Governor of Tamil Nadu was the Chief Guest and awarded various Sanskrit scholars and experts for their distinguished services to the field of Sanskrit.
venue: Bharatiyar Mandapam at Raj Bhavan, Guindy

title: National Workshop on  Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy
subtitle: National Workshop on  Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy  – 26 & 27 of July 2024
description: The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute is celebrating its 75th anniversary.  To commemorate this milestone the institute organized a Two day  Workshop Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy  on 26th & 27th of July 2024
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: Synopsis Presentation
subtitle: A CRITICAL STUDY OF VAIRĀGYA AND MUMUKṢU-VYAVAHĀRA PRAKARAṆA OF THE YOGAVĀSIṢṬHA IN THE LIGHT OF THE COMMENTARY TĀTPARYAPRAKĀŚA OF  ŚRĪ ĀNANDABODHENDRA SARASVATĪ
description: Ph.D. candidate Ms. Lavanya V.Eswar, under the supervision of Dr. V. Yamuna Devi, Deputy Director, The KSRI,   submitted her synopsis on "A CRITICAL STUDY OF VAIRĀGYA AND MUMUKṢU-VYAVAHĀRA PRAKARAṆA OF THE YOGAVĀSIṢṬHA IN THE LIGHT OF THE COMMENTARY TĀTPARYAPRAKĀŚA OF  ŚRĪ ĀNANDABODHENDRA SARASVATĪ" at the Institute premises on 19th July 2024.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: National Workshop on Sanskrit Literature
subtitle: National Workshop on Sanskrit Literature  – 28 & 29 of June 2024
description: The Kuppuswami Sastri Research Institute is celebrating its 75th anniversary. To commemorate this milestone the institute organized a Two day National Workshop on Sanskrit Literature on 28th and 29th of June 2024.
venue: Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati Madapam, The KSRI

title: SŪRYA IN SANSKRIT LITERATURE VIS-A-VIS MODERN CONCEPTS
subtitle: SŪRYA IN SANSKRIT LITERATURE VIS-A-VIS MODERN CONCEPTS
description: Ph.D. candidate Mrs. S. RENGANAYAKI, under the supervision of Dr. V. Kameswari, Former Director of The KSRI, defended her thesis on "SŪRYA IN SANSKRIT LITERATURE VIS-A-VIS MODERN CONCEPTS" at the Institute premises on May 22, 2024.

title: RATNASAṄGRAHAḤ OF ŚRĪ RAGHUNĀTHĀCĀRYA: CRITICAL EDITION AND STUDY
subtitle: RATNASAṄGRAHAḤ OF ŚRĪ RAGHUNĀTHĀCĀRYA: CRITICAL EDITION AND STUDY
description: Ph. D. candidate Mr. S Balakrishnan, under the supervision of Dr. T.V. VASUDEVA, (M.A., Ph.D.), Deputy Director, The KSRI,   defended his thesis on "RATNASAṄGRAHAḤ OF ŚRĪ RAGHUNĀTHĀCĀRYA: CRITICAL EDITION AND STUDY" at the Institute premises on 7th May 2024.

title: National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil - DAY 2
subtitle: National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil – DAY 2
description: As a Part of the 75th Anniversary, The KSRI conducted a National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil" on 24th and 25th of November 2023 in collaboration with The Samskrita Academy, Madras.

title: National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil - DAY 1
subtitle: National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil – DAY 1
description: As a Part of the 75th Anniversary, The KSRI conducted a National Seminar on Bhakti Literature In Sanskrit and Tamil" on 24th and 25th of November 2023 in collaboration with The Samskrita Academy, Madras.

title: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY II
subtitle: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY II
description: As a Part of the 75th Anniversary, The KSRI conducted a two day "National Seminar on Arts and Architecture" on 21st and 22nd of August 2023 in collaboration with The Samskrita Academy, Madras.

title: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY I
subtitle: National Seminar on Arts and Architecture - DAY I
description: As a Part of the 75th Anniversary, The KSRI conducted a two day "National Seminar on Arts and Architecture" on 21st and 22nd of August 2023 in collaboration with The Samskrita Academy, Madras.  Dr. R. K. Raghavan, President of the KSRI delivered the Welcome address. Śilpakalāratnam Dr. T. Satyamurthy, Former Superintending Archaeologist, ASI, Chennai, delivered the inaugural address on 21st Augutst 2023 .

title: CRITICAL STUDY  OF PĀṬIGAṆITA OF ŚRIDHARA AND GAṆITATILAKA OF ŚRIPATI
subtitle: CRITICAL STUDY  OF PĀṬIGAṆITA OF ŚRIDHARA AND GAṆITATILAKA OF ŚRIPATI
description: Mr. K.N Srikkanth, Ph. D. candidate of Dr. K. S. Balasubramanian,  Director, The KSRI,  Defended his thesis on "CRITICAL STUDY  OF PĀṬIGAṆITA OF ŚRIDHARA AND GAṆITATILAKA OF ŚRIPATI"  at the Institute premises on 12th July 2023.

title: KĀŚYAPA SAMHITĀ – TEXT ON VIṢACIKITSĀ : A CRITICAL STUDY
subtitle: KĀŚYAPA SAMHITĀ – TEXT ON VIṢACIKITSĀ : A CRITICAL STUDY
description: Ms. S. Goda Devi, Ph. D. candidate of Dr. V. Kameswari,  Former Director, The KSRI, Defended her thesis on "KĀŚYAPA SAMHITĀ – TEXT ON VIṢACIKITSĀ : A CRITICAL STUDY "  at the Institute premises on 08th June 2023.

title: CRITICAL STUDY OF THE PLAY PRASANNARĀGHAVA OF JAYADEVA
subtitle: CRITICAL STUDY OF THE PLAY PRASANNARĀGHAVA OF JAYADEVA
description: Ms. N. Bhuvaneswari, Ph. D. candidate of Dr. V. Kameswari, Directer, The KSRI, Defended her thesis on CRITICAL STUDY OF THE PLAY PRASANNARĀGHAVA OF JAYADEVA at the Institute premises on 10th March 2023.

title: ŚĀHENDRAVILĀSA OF ŚRĪDHARA VEṄKAṬEŚA: A CRITICAL STUDY
